long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bullet in left top angle has the same functions like default window header: drag and drop, minimize, maximize, close.
To close the app use default hotkeys like Chrome: Ctrl+W or Alt+F4.
And to reload the app - Ctrl+R.
Switch to the default windowed mode - Ctrl+Shift+F.

This app have no logger or grabber your data. It's only external tab without frame. You can check this by looking at the source code - https://github.com/technobulka/trello-chrome-app


=== Updates ===

 - problem with attachments was not solved
